text: (napiye!) Allahvin (melana) takutikkut takkavaru avanai avarkal kanniyappatuttuvatillai. Pumi (ivvalavu peritaka irunta potilum atu) muluvatum marumaiyil avanutaiya oru kaippitiyil irukkum. Melum, vanankal anaittum curuttappattu avanutaiya valatu kaiyil irukkum. Ivarkal inaivaippatai vittu avan mika melanavan; avan mika paricuttamanavan
